Control Name: Removes Data and Software From Entity Control—Procedures are in place to remove data and software stored on equipment to be removed from the physical control of the entity and to render such data and software unreadable.

control_attributes.Control: Removes Data and Software From Entity Control—Procedures are in place to remove data and software stored on equipment to be removed from the physical control of the entity and to render such data and software unreadable.
control_attributes.SubCategory: CC6.5 The entity discontinues logical and physical protections over physical assets only after the ability to read or recover data and software from those assets has been diminished and is no longer required to meet the entity’s objectives.
